references.paper_title: Structured denoising diffusion models in discrete state-spaces
references.reason: This paper introduces a novel approach to denoising diffusion models, which are crucial for generating high-fidelity 3D meshes, as validated in the current paper.

references.paper_title: Language models are unsupervised multitask learners
references.reason: This foundational paper introduces the use of large language models for various downstream tasks, including text-to-3D mesh generation.

references.paper_title: Nerf: Representing scenes as neural radiance fields for view synthesis
references.reason: This influential paper introduces Neural Radiance Fields (NeRFs), which are closely related to the Neural Coordinate Fields (NeurCFs) used in the current work.

references.paper_title: Polygen: An autoregressive generative model of 3d meshes
references.reason: This paper provides a detailed explanation of auto-regressive models for generating meshes, the approach adopted in the current work.

references.paper_title: MeshGPT: Generating triangle meshes with decoder-only transformers
references.reason: This paper introduces MeshGPT, a state-of-the-art generative model for 3D meshes that is benchmarked in the current study.
